title: Extra host Renee Bargh hits the red carpet for ELLE's 2019 Women in Hollywood awards
text:
She's no stranger to the glitz and glamour of the red carpet.

And Extra host Renee Bargh proved she could give the world's most glamorous celebs a run for their money as she attended ELLE's Women in Hollywood awards on Monday evening.

The Australian entertainment reporter joined a bevvy of famous faces to celebrate this year's winners at the glitzy event in Beverly Hills.

Raising the fashion Bargh! Extra host Renee looked charming in checks as she hit the red carpet for ELLE's Women in Hollywood awards in Beverly Hills on Monday evening.

Chic: She wore a long, navy and white patterned dress with a V-neckline, button-up detail and oversized sleeves

Queensland-born Renee, 32, who moved to the US in 2010, looked charming in checks as she arrived at the glitzy event.

She wore a long, navy and white patterned dress with a V-neckline, button-up detail and oversized sleeves.

Emphasising her tiny waist, Renee cinched the frock with a matching belt.

Renee paired the elegant ankle-length dress with pointed white stilettos.

She accessorised the outfit with minimalist jewellery, opting for a pair of gold earrings, a thin bracelet and simple gold rings.

Showing off her glowing tan, Renee went for natural makeup, highlighting her cheek bones with a touch of rosy pink blusher and a nude lip.

Meanwhile, her shoulder length hair was worn in casual waves that framed her face.

ELLE's Women In Hollywood awards celebrate figures from the celebrity world whose achievements have stood out over the past twelve months.

This year's winners include the likes of Dolly Parton, Natalie Portman, Scarlett Johansson and Gwyneth Paltrow.
description: She's no stranger to the glitz and glamour of the red carpet.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
